allow: Bash(psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT u.id, u.email, b.id as brand_id, b.name, b.""isPersonal"", m.role FROM users u LEFT JOIN memberships m ON u.id = m.""userId"" LEFT JOIN brands b ON m.""brandId"" = b.id ORDER BY u.email LIMIT 10;")
Bash(node -e "console.log(process.env.UNSPLASH_ACCESS_KEY ? ''UNSPLASH_ACCESS_KEY está configurado'' : ''UNSPLASH_ACCESS_KEY NO está configurado'')")
Bash(psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT id, ""brandId"", ""batchId"", title, ""contentType"", ""createdAt"" FROM ""GeneratedPost"" ORDER BY ""createdAt"" DESC LIMIT 10;")
Bash(psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT email, name, industry, ""companyDescription"", ""targetAudience"", ""brandPersonality"", ""onboardingCompleted"" FROM users LIMIT 5;")
Bash(psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT email, LENGTH(templates::text) as templates_size FROM users WHERE email = ''stellagroupapps@gmail.com'';")

Bash(node -e "console.log(''AWS_S3_BUCKET:'', process.env.AWS_S3_BUCKET ? ''CONFIGURED'' : ''NOT CONFIGURED''); console.log(''AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID:'', process.env.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID ? ''CONFIGURED'' : ''NOT CONFIGURED''); console.log(''AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY:'', process.env.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY ? ''CONFIGURED'' : ''NOT CONFIGURED''); console.log(''AWS_REGION:'', process.env.AWS_REGION || ''NOT SET (defaults to us-east-1)'');")

Bash(psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT email, templates::jsonb->0->''name'' as first_template_name, templates::jsonb->0->''html'' as first_template_html_preview FROM users WHERE email = ''stellagroupapps@gmail.com'' LIMIT 1;")
Bash(psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT email, ""logoUrl"", ""brandColors"" FROM users WHERE email = ''stellagroupapps@gmail.com'';")
Bash(psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT id, ""contentType"", title, images, ""createdAt"" FROM ""GeneratedPost"" ORDER BY ""createdAt"" DESC LIMIT 5;")
